bibl.title: The Date of P.Oxy. XLIII 3119, the Deputy-Prefect Lucius Mussius Aemilianus, and the Persecution of Christians by Valerian and Gallienus.
bibl.note: L. 7 should be reconstructed as διασημοτάτου δ[ιέποντος τὴν ἡγεμονίαν ..., and can only refer to L. Mussius Aemilianus, deputy-prefect / prefect from the late 250s to the early 260s.
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell, The Date of P.Oxy. XLIII 3119, the Deputy-Prefect Lucius Mussius Aemilianus, and the Persecution of Christians by Valerian and Gallienus.
L. 7 should be reconstructed as διασημοτάτου δ[ιέποντος τὴν ἡγεμονίαν ..., and can only refer to L. Mussius Aemilianus, deputy-prefect / prefect from the late 250s to the early 260s.
